A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I appreciate that they are going in a different direction. All things must end/change eventually. The film was extremely well shot\, tasteful CGI\, excellent story-telling\, and incredibly original. There was a sub-plot here and there that felt shoe-horned in; but overall this is my new favorite Star Wars film while previously it was Empire. As long as you enter the film fully expecting it to not cater to the olden ways of Star Wars films you will exit happily. Enjoy it for what it is; the dawn of a new day in the realm that we hold so dear to our hearts.
